4.0.name: wordpress/activecampaign-subscription-forms
4.0.description:
This plugin connects WordPress with your ActiveCampaign software and allows you to embed a subscription form on your site with various options for how the form is displayed and submitted.

After installing go to Settings > ActiveCampaign, or Appearance > Widgets to activate this plugin. The Settings section is for use with the shortcode ([activecampaign]), and the Widget is primarily for embedding in a sidebar.

For more information and to download a free trial visit the ActiveCampaign Email Marketing web site.
